text:
透過Dior Beauty App於網上商店購物可額外獲贈Dior Beauty 便攜鏡子#乙個！ 立即下載Dior Beauty App以獲得您的專屬電子會員證，隨時隨地查閱您的會員積分、瀏覽購物紀錄、輕鬆預約面部護理及專業眉型塑造服務，或於網上選購您最喜愛的Dior美妍產品！
下載App及立即選購: [redacted_url]
trans:
Shopping at the online store via the Dior Beauty App grants an additional Dior Beauty portable mirror #One! Download the Dior Beauty App now to get your exclusive digital membership card, check your membership points anytime and anywhere, browse shopping history, easily book facial treatments and professional eyebrow shaping services, or shop for your favorite Dior beauty products online!
Download the App and start shopping now: [redacted_url]
